document.text:
From: 
To: 
Cc: 
4 
Subject: RE: Epstein items 
Date: Wed, 22 Jul 2020 21:07:07 +0000 
Okay, great. Thanks. Very frustrating given the history, but hopefully we now have everything (and everything done 
correctly). 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, July 22, 2020 4:58 PM 
To 
Cc 
Su•iect: pstein items 
efl 
FYI below, the FBI says its dropping off extractions of nearly all the remaining devices tomorrow. Why after ten months of 
nothing we were able to get literally everything in a week is absolutely beyond me, but hopefully the data they get us is 
correct, accurate, and workable. We should be able to get the drive sent to =copied here) tomorrow, and then if it all 
looks okay, likely out tom for processing and upload next week. Will keep everyone posted as always. 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, July 22, 2020 16:56 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Epstein items 
Thanks very much for letting us know, that's very helpful. After you finalize and drop off the drive, if tomorrow you could 
please send us a scrubbed and updated spreadsheet, so we can match up everything we're working with, that would be 
extremely helpful. 
thanks again, 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, July 22, 2020 16:52 
To: 
Subject: Epstein items 
The last item is currently copying to the drive gave me for submittal to Southern. Unfortunately, the copy 
will take several more hours, so it will not be available today, but will be 1st thing tomorrow morning. This 
EFTA00023763

includes all outstanding items except the 2 servers that need hardware data recovery. I'll drop the drive off 
tomorrow morning. Let me know if you need anything else. 
EFTA00023764
